div.div: at Gettysburg, PA | Shirk at Musselman

tr.td: Moravian wins toss, defers, Greyhounds to defend south end zone
A. Nicolardi kickoff 57 yards to the GC8, Aden Twer return 18 yards to the GC26 (D. Siepietowski).
